content: With the Maitreya's Orb equipped, when you land enough successful hits on an enemy, a fatal blow you recieve will be negated.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Maitreya's_Orb.md', within the main section titled 'Maitreya's Orb'.
The content is as follows:
With the Maitreya's Orb equipped, when you land enough successful hits on an enemy, a fatal blow you recieve will be negated.
